alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:17PM CDT until March 26 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting and is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 26 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 26.0 28.9 Thu 8 pm CDT 27.6 23.9 20.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
